SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT `ID` as uuid,`Name`,`Description`,`Url`,`Price`,`NowPrice` FROM `TB_MB_Shopping` WHERE `Status`=TRUE <%=AND `Name` LIKE @@Name@@%> <%=AND `Description` LIKE @@Description@@%> ORDER BY `CreationDate` DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>;

SELECT `Version`,`InnerVersion` ,`target_url` AS TargetUrl,`UpdateContent` ,`update_status` AS UpdateStatus,`LowestVersion` FROM TB_MB_AppVersion a WHERE `AppType`=@@AppType@@ AND `Status`=FALSE AND a.update_status IN(1,2) AND a.`Version`>=@@Version@@ ORDER BY a.`Version` DESC LIMIT 1;
